contexts.context: ...too much respect for the Flag of France to <mark>venture</mark>, excepting in cases of extraordinary suspicion, to...
The numbers put on board in each <mark>venture</mark> are far from being proportioned to the proper capacity...
...it should seem impossible for any other Power to <mark>venture</mark> to pronounce upon them.
...with regard to Great Britain, no Minister could <mark>venture</mark> to advise the King to sanction such a Principle...
